text: yam pirimiyakugen ho veva kantavakagen ho veva deva visvasavantayaku lesa sita yameku dæhæmi katayuttak kale da evita yahapat jivitayak gata kirima sandaha api ohu va jivat karavannemu. tavada ovun sidu karamin siti dæta ita yahapat ayurin ovunge pratiphala valata api ovunata yahapata pirinamannemu
